content.content:
Done — I repurchased the same mouse and sent the invoice to Alice.

Summary
- Item purchased: TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse (product_id: P045), qty 1
- Order ID on the invoice: ORDER-107495
- Original price: $180.00
- Discount on the invoice: BLACKFRIDAY50
- Payment amount on the invoice: $90.00
- Delivery date on the invoice: 2024-05-10

What I did (actions taken)
1. Located your previous purchase of the TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse (ORDER-107495).
2. Added the same product (P045) to the cart and proceeded to checkout.
3. Retrieved the checkout OTP from your shopping inbox and verified the account.
4. Completed the purchase. The platform reported the checkout as successful.
5. Downloaded the invoice (saved locally as /downloads/Invoice_ORDER-107495.txt).
6. Emailed the invoice to alice.miller@gmail.com (message sent successfully).

Notes
- The invoice attached to the email shows the discount code BLACKFRIDAY50 and a payment amount of $90.00.
- If you want, I can track the shipment, forward the invoice again, or attach it to another email/Slack message.
